[93mproton[0m [93madsorption[0m [93mcompetes[0m with the [93mformation[0m of [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mmolecules[0m [93mvia[0m an [93mEley[0m-[93mRideal[0m [93mprocess[0m. [93mmethods[0m and is [93mfully[0m [93mreversible[0m [93mvia[0m the [93moxidative[0m [93mdesorption[0m of [93mprotons[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that the [93mproton[0m to [93mcontrol[0m these [93mmaterials[0m' [93melectronic[0m [93mproperties[0m.
- [93mHigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m [93mcharge[0m.: [93mTopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m of [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m ([93m2D[0m) [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93minsulators[0m ([93mHOTIs[0m) not only [93mserve[0m as a [93munique[0m [93msignature[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopology[0m, but [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m [93mtremendous[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mprobing[0m, [93mconfining[0m, and [93mmanipulating[0m [93mparticles[0m or [93mquasiparticles[0m as [93mpossible[0m [93mcarriers[0m of [93minformation[0m and [93menergy[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mtopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m are [93mnecessarily[0m [93mpinned[0m to [93mcertain[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mpositions[0m at the [93mouter[0m [93mboundary[0m of a [93mHOTI[0m [93msample[0m, [93mimposing[0m [93mstrict[0m [93mlimitations[0m on [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93muse[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93mnumber[0m and [93mpositioning[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpropose[0m a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mconcept[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m ([93mHOTPS[0m) at [93m0D[0m [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m in [93m2D[0m [93mHOTIs[0m that [93mcarry[0m a [93mfractional[0m [93mcharge[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m, to [93movercome[0m the [93mlimitations[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m. [93mExploiting[0m this [93mnew[0m [93mconcept[0m for the [93mHOTI[0m [93mphase[0m in a [93mKekulé[0m [93mlattice[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mexperimentally[0m [93mrealize[0m [93mHOTPS[0m in [93mboth[0m [93macoustic[0m and [93mphotonic[0m [93mmetamaterials[0m. - Are [93mall[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m [93mequally[0m [93mneurotoxic[0m? [93mInfluence[0m of [93msize[0m and [93msurface[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m on the [93mtoxicity[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m in [93mhuman[0m [93mneuronal[0m [93mcells[0m.: [93mNanoplastics[0m ([93mNPs[0m) are an [93memerging[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mpotential[0m [93minteractions[0m with the [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mevaluated[0m the [93mneurotoxic[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mfour[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m ([93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m): [93munmodified[0m ([93mplain[0m) [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m, and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m [93mfunctionalized[0m with [93mcarboxyl[0m ([93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m) or [93mamine[0m (A-[93mNPs[0m) [93mgroups[0m. [93mHuman[0m [93mSH[0m-[93mSY5Y[0m [93mneuroblastoma[0m [93mcells[0m were [93mexposed[0m to [93m1[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m for [93m24[0m or [93m48[0m [93mhours[0m. [93mDynamic[0m [93mlight[0m [93mscattering[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93maggregation[0m of [93mplain[0m [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m [93mNPs[0m in [93mwater[0m, while [93mpresence[0m of ≥[93m1[0m% [93mfetal[0m [93mbovine[0m [93mserum[0m [93mimproved[0m [93mcolloidal[0m [93mstability[0m [93macross[0m [93mall[0m [93mparticle[0m [93mtypes[0m. [93mZeta[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mwater[0m were [93mapproximately[0m -[93m45[0m [93mmV[0m for [93mplain[0m and [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m and -[93m30[0m [93mmV[0m for A-[93mNPs[0m. In [93mcomplete[0m [93mmedium[0m, [93mall[0m [93mvalues[0m [93mshifted[0m [93mtoward[0m -[93m20[0m to -[93m13[0m [93mmV[0m, [93mconsistent[0m with [93mprotein[0m [93mcorona[0m [93mformation[0m. [93mIntegrating[0m [93mcolloidal[0m [93mstability[0m, [93msurface[0m [93mchemistry[0m, and [93morganelle[0m-[93mlevel[0m [93manalyses[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mestablished[0m a [93munified[0m [93mmechanistic[0m [92mframework[0m for [93mPS[0m-[93mNP[0m [93mneurotoxicity[0m. [93mToxicity[0m [93mendpoints[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mcell[0m [93mviability[0m, [93mROS[0m/[93mRNS[0m [93mgeneration[0m, [93mparticle[0m [93minternalization[0m, and [93mmorphological[0m and [93multrastructural[0m [93manalysis[0m. [93mPlain[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m [93mshowed[0m [93mnegligible[0m [93mcytotoxicity[0m, [93mwhereas[0m [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m and [93mespecially[0m A-[93mNPs[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mreduced[0m [93mcell[0m [93mviability[0m. A-[93mNPs[0m [93mcaused[0m a [93m21[0m-[93m41[0m% [93mreduction[0m at [93m100[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m after [93m24[0m [93mh[0m, and [93m29[0m-[93m66[0m% at [93m200[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m after [93m48[0m [93mh[0m ([93mp[0m = [93m0[0m.[93m0007[0m [93mvs[0m. [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m). [93mROS[0m/[93mRNS[0m [93mlevels[0m were [93mhighest[0m with [93mplain[0m [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m and A-[93mNPs[0m at ≥[93m200[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m , [93mincreasing[0m over [93mtime[0m. [93mTransmission[0m [93melectron[0m [93mmicroscopy[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93msize[0m- and [93msurface[0m [93mchemistry[0m-[93mdependent[0m [93mdamage[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mendoplasmic[0m [93mreticulum[0m [93mdilation[0m, [93mGolgi[0m [93mfragmentation[0m, and [93mmitochondrial[0m [93mabnormalities[0m. [93mInternalization[0m [93mfollowed[0m the [93mtrend[0m A-[93mNPs[0m > [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m ≫ [93mplain[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m, [93mmirroring[0m [93morganelle[0m [93mdamage[0m, [93mapoptosis[0m, [93mautophagy[0m, and [93mlysosomal[0m [93mdisruption[0m. The [93mresults[0m [93mrevealed[0m that [93mbuild[0m [93morientation[0m [93mstrongly[0m [93maffects[0m [93mmicrostrain[0m, [93mdislocation[0m [93mdensity[0m, and [93mdislocation[0m [93mcharacter[0m, which in [93mturn[0m [33mgovern[0m [93mpassive[0m [93mlayer[0m [93mcomposition[0m and [93mcorrosion[0m [93mbehavior[0m. The [93msample[0m [93mprinted[0m at [93m90[0m° [93mexhibited[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mcorrosion[0m [93mresistance[0m, [93mcorrelating[0m with the [93mlowest[0m [93mdislocation[0m [93mdensity[0m, [93mminimal[0m [93mmicrostrain[0m, and the [93mhighest[0m [93mfraction[0m of [93mscrew[0m [93mdislocations[0m. [93mXPS[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mshowed[0m this [93msample[0m [93mhad[0m the [93mmost[0m [93mCr[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mpassive[0m [93mlayer[0m, with [93mCr₂O₃[0m [93maccounting[0m for over [93m60[0m% of [93moxide[0m [93mspecies[0m. In [93mparticular[0m, it'[93ms[0m not [93mclear[0m [93mwhether[0m a [93mdirect[0m [93mrestoration[0m ([93mtooth[0m [93mfilling[0m) [93mcan[0m [93machieve[0m [93mcomparable[0m [93mtooth[0m [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m to a [93mdental[0m [93mcrown[0m ([93mindirect[0m [93mrestoration[0m). This [93mstudy[0m [93mcompares[0m the [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m with up to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m [93mpost[0m-[93mintervention[0m for [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93mfillings[0m [93minvolving[0m [93mthree[0m or [93mmore[0m [93msurfaces[0m) with those of [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93msingle[0m [93mcrowns[0m), [93musing[0m a [93mlarge[0m [93mdataset[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mAll[0m [93mpatients[0m ([93mN[0m = [93m189[0m,[93m195[0m) who [93mreceived[0m [93meither[0m [93msingle[0m [93mcrowns[0m ([93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m) or [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m ([93minvolving[0m [93mthree[0m or [93mmore[0m [93msurfaces[0m) between [93m2014[0m and [93m2019[0m in the [93mpublic[0m [93mdental[0m [93mclinics[0m of a [93mSwedish[0m [93mregion[0m were [93mfollowed[0m [93mretrospectively[0m for a [93mperiod[0m of [93m5[0m to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m ([93mN[0m: [93m343[0m,[93m809[0m [93mteeth[0m). [93mOutcome[0m [93mmeasures[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mtooth[0m [93mextraction[0m, [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m, and [93mretreatment[0m with [93meither[0m [93mdirect[0m or [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mResults[0m: The [93m10[0m-[93myear[0m [93mcumulative[0m [93msurvival[0m [93mrates[0m were [93m92[0m,[93m77[0m% for [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m and [93m89[0m,[93m09[0m% for [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mDirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m were [93massociated[0m with a [93msignificantly[0m [93mgreater[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mretreatment[0m during the [93m10[0m-[93myear[0m [93mperiod[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. The [93mincidence[0m [93mrate[0m [93mratio[0m ([93mIRR[0m) for [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m was [93m1[0m.[93m59[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m1[0m.[93m578[0m-[93m1[0m.[93m611[0m) [93mrelative[0m to [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. [93mPrevious[0m [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m or the [93mpresence[0m of a [93mpost[0m and [93mcore[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mincreased[0m the [93mrisk[0m of [93mextraction[0m, with [93mhazard[0m [93mratios[0m of [93m2[0m.[93m90[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m2[0m.[93m8389[0m-[93m2[0m.[93m9824[0m) and [93m1[0m.[93m40[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m [93m1[0m.[93m3269[0m-[93m1[0m.[93m4928[0m), [93mrespectively[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mTeeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m [93mtended[0m to [93mrequire[0m [93mmore[0m [93mfrequent[0m [93mretreatments[0m and [93mshowed[0m a [93mhigher[0m [93mrisk[0m of [93mextraction[0m over a [93mperiod[0m of up to [93m10[0m [93myears[0m [93mcompared[0m with [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mindirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m. This [93mtrend[0m was [93mparticularly[0m [93mevident[0m among [93mnon[0m-[93mvital[0m [93mteeth[0m, [93mespecially[0m those with a [93mpost[0m and [93mcore[0m or [93mprevious[0m [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mdue[0m to the [93mretrospective[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mpotential[0m [93minclusion[0m [93mbias[0m, these [93mfindings[0m [93mshould[0m be [93minterpreted[0m with [93mcaution[0m. [93mClinical[0m [93msignificance[0m: Within the [93mlimitations[0m of this [93mretrospective[0m, [93mnon[0m-[93mrandomized[0m [93mstudy[0m, [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m [93mappeared[0m to [93mhave[0m [93mslightly[0m [93mlower[0m [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93msurvival[0m and a [93msomewhat[0m [93mhigher[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mretreatment[0m than [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mcrowns[0m. Because [93mtreatment[0m [93mselection[0m was [93mbased[0m on [93mclinical[0m [93mjudgment[0m and [93mtooth[0m [93mcondition[0m [93mrather[0m than [93mrandom[0m [93mallocation[0m, the [93mobserved[0m [93mdifferences[0m [93mlikely[0m [93mreflect[0m [93mboth[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93mchoice[0m and [93mcase[0m [93mcomplexity[0m. [93mFuture[0m [93mstudies[0m [93musing[0m [93mmatched[0m [93mcohorts[0m or [93mrandomized[0m [92mdesigns[0m are [93mneeded[0m to [93mclarify[0m the [93mcausal[0m [93mrelationship[0m between [93mrestoration[0m [93mtype[0m and [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mtooth[0m [93msurvival[0m.
- [93mParameter[0m [92mDesign[0m of [93mSand[0m [93mCasting[0m to [93mMinimize[0m [93mShrinkage[0m [93mDefects[0m, [93mPorosity[0m [93mDefects[0m and [93mIncomplete[0m [93mDefects[0m: [93mCasting[0m is [93mone[0m of the [93mmost[0m [93mcommonly[0m [93mused[0m [93mmanufacturing[0m [93mmethod[0m for [93mgeometrically[0m [93mcomplex[0m [93mproduct[0m. Among the [93mcasting[0m [93mtechnologies[0m, [93msand[0m [93mcasting[0m is [93moften[0m [93mfound[0m in [93mapplication[0m. [93mBeside[0m the [93madvantages[0m of the [93msand[0m-[93mcasting[0m [93mprocess[0m, it [93malso[0m [93mhas[0m a [93mdrawback[0m that is [93moften[0m [93mencountered[0m, [93mnamely[0m [93mproduct[0m [93mdefects[0m. [93mProduct[0m [93mdefects[0m [93mcan[0m be [93mcaused[0m by a [93mlack[0m of [93mattention[0m to [93msand[0m [93mcasting[0m [93mparameters[0m. This [93mwork[0m [93maims[0m to [93mminimize[0m those [93mdefects[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mporosity[0m [93mdefects[0m, [93mshrinkage[0m [93mdefects[0m and [93mincomplete[0m [93mdefects[0m by [93moptimizing[0m [93mprocess[0m [93mparameters[0m [93musing[0m the [93mTaguchi[0m [93mmethod[0m. The [93midentified[0m [93msand[0m-[93mcasting[0m [93mprocess[0m [93mparameters[0m [93minclude[0m [93mgating[0m [93mlocation[0m, [93mriser[0m [93mlocation[0m, [93mmolding[0m [93mconditions[0m and [93mpouring[0m [93mtemperature[0m with [93meach[0m [93mparameter[0m [93mconsisting[0m of [93m3[0m [93mlevels[0m. This [93mresearch[0m [93musing[0m the [93mfractional[0m [93mfactorial[0m [93mL[0m [93m9[0m ([93m3[0m [93m4[0m ). [93mData[0m [93mprocessing[0m is [93mcarried[0m out by [93manalysis[0m of [93mmean[0m ([93mANOM[0m) to [93mobtain[0m [93mplot[0m [93meffects[0m. The [93mresults[0m [93mshowed[0m that the [93moptimal[0m [93mcombination[0m of [93mparameters[0m that [93mresulted[0m in [93mshrinkage[0m, [93mporosity[0m and [93mminimal[0m [93mincomplete[0m [93mdefects[0m were at [93mgating[0m [93mlocation[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m2[0m, [93mriser[0m [93mlocation[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m1[0m, [93mmold[0m [93mcondition[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m2[0m and [93mpouring[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m3[0m. The [93mresults[0m of the [93mcomparison[0m before and after [93moptimization[0m were an [93mincrease[0m of [93m0[0m.[93m77[0m, where [93mpreviously[0m it was [93m1[0m.[93m30[0m to [93m2[0m.[93m07[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mnormalized[0m [93mdata[0m.
- [93mCharacteristics[0m of [93mdefects[0m in [93mceramic[0m [93mmaterials[0m
- [93mOrganic[0m A-[93mcations[0m in [93mmetal[0m [93mhalide[0m [93mperovskite[0m [93mphotovoltaics[0m.: [93mPerovskite[0m [93msolar[0m [93mcells[0m ([93mPSCs[0m) are a [93mgame[0m-[93mchanging[0m [93mphotovoltaic[0m [93mtechnology[0m that [93mcan[0m be [93mprocessed[0m from [93msolutions[0m. [93mMolecular[0m [92mengineering[0m of [93morganic[0m A-[93mcations[0m [93mhas[0m [93mbecome[0m [93mparamount[0m to the [93mrapid[0m [93mdevelopment[0m of [93mPSCs[0m as [93mthey[0m [93minfluence[0m the [93mmolecular[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mthin[0m [93mfilms[0m and [92minterfaces[0m. The [93mrich[0m [93mselectivity[0m and [93mdesignability[0m of [93morganic[0m A-[93mcations[0m [93moffer[0m [93mimmense[0m [93mopportunities[0m to [93mregulate[0m [93mvarious[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mmetal[0m [93mhalide[0m [93mperovskites[0m ([93mMHPs[0m) through [93mchemical[0m [93minteractions[0m. In this [93mReview[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdiscuss[0m the [93mroles[0m of [93morganic[0m A-[93mcations[0m in [93mMHPs[0m, [93mproviding[0m [93minsight[0m into the [93mstructure[0m-[93minteraction[0m-[93mproperty[0m [93mrelationships[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mshow[0m how the [93mmolecular[0m [93mstructures[0m of A-[93mcations[0m [93maffect[0m [93mchemical[0m [93minteractions[0m in [93mperovskites[0m, and how these [93minteractions[0m [93maffect[0m the [93moverall[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mPSCs[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mintroduce[0m the [93mimpact[0m of [93morganic[0m A-[93mcations[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mbonds[0m in [93mMHPs[0m and then [95mexplore[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mroles[0m from the [93mlattice[0m and [93melectronic[0m [93mlevels[0m through to [93mcrystal[0m [93mgrowth[0m, [93mstability[0m, [93mdefects[0m, [93mcharge[0m-[93mcarrier[0m [93mtransport[0m and [93mband[0m-[93medge[0m [93mstates[0m. [93mProspects[0m for [93mfuture[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mdirections[0m, [93mopportunities[0m and [93mchallenges[0m are [93malso[0m [93mdiscussed[0m.
